name: SnowGoblimon
description: SnowGoblimon is a light blue goblin -like Digimon with blue eyes and pointy ears. It has two large teeth in its mouth, five fingers on each hand and five toes on each foot. It wears a pierced ring on its left ear and a brown sleeveless jacket with light brown trim and pom-pom like buttons that has light brown leather adorned by metal orbs near its shoulders. It also wears a black helmet with light brown trim and a spike on top. SnowGoblimon carries a wooden club with screws on it, and a metallic ornament under its hilt.
